definition: radical sign √ (math.)
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Why must my three keep out of sight beneath a vicious square-root sign?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼一定要讓我囚困在這個邪惡的根號下面？

sentences.english: Hey baby, can I see what’s under your radical?
sentences.chinese: 寶貝，我可以看看你的根號下面是什麼嗎？
